name: DELTA AIR INTERNATIONAL AVIATION ACADEMY, INC.
about: Delta Air International Aviation Academy, Inc. (DAIAA), a member of the AMA Education System, is a premier flight school located in Plaridel, Bulacan, Philippines. Established in 2001 by a group of young pilots, DAIAA was later acquired by AMAES in 2011, under the vision of Dr. Amable R. Aguiluz V to set the bar in aviation training. The academy blends state-of-the-art technology with the highest standards of safety and quality, offering courses such as Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, Instrument Rating, Multi Engine Rating, and Flight Instructor Course. DAIAA operates its own hangar, provides Wi-Fi enabled housing, and serves international cuisine. Known for its safety-conscious approach and use of pure aviation gas and original spare parts, DAIAA is committed to producing world-class and globally competitive pilots. With a strong focus on hands-on training using modern aircraft and simulators, DAIAA ensures its graduates are well-prepared for a career in the skies.
services:
["Private Pilot License (PPL)
Commercial Pilot License (CPL)
Instrument Rating
Flight Instructor License"]
